瓹字的基本解释

瓹
juàn
瓮底的滤孔，用于过滤米酒。

瓹
juān
陶器。

瓹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juān］
［《集韻》圭玄切，平先，見。］
陶器。
[②]［juàn］
［《廣韻》古縣切，去霰，見。］
瓮底部过滤米酒的滤孔。

瓹字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　瓹； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页749第14
【廣韻】古縣切【集韻】扃縣切，?音睊。【玉篇】瓮底孔下取酒也。【廣韻】盆底孔。【集韻】盎下竅。　又【集韻】圭懸切，音涓。陶器。

瓹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
瓹字的起名意思

暂无。

Wan
Basic explanation of words
Wan
juàn
The filter holes at the bottom of the urn are used to filter rice wine.
Wan
juān
pottery.
Wan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juān］
["Jiyun" Gui Xuanqie, Pingxian, see you. ]
pottery.
[②]［juàn］
["Guangyun" Guxian cut, go to Cha, see you. ]
The filter holes at the bottom of the urn for filtering rice wine.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Zi Department] 　瓹; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 749 14
[Guangyun] Ancient County Cuts [Jiyun] Pan County cuts, the sound? [Jade articles] Take wine from the bottom of the urn. 【Guangyun】Pelvic bottom hole. [Ji Yun] Angxia Qiao.　 [Ji Yun] Gui Xuan cuts, the sound trickles. pottery.
